title: Want my FontLab manuals?
content:
Hi Folks,

I have the following and don't need them anymore:

FontLab 4.6 for Macintosh User Manual - three-hole drilled with chicago screws  
ScanFont 4 for Macintosh User Manual - thermal bound

They're both letter-sized, digitally printed on bright white paper, with vinyl covers. Together, they weigh about 7 pounds and are yours if you pay for the shipping (from San Francisco, CA 94110) or get them from me in person.

Message me if you want 'em!

- Amy, aka l'Abecedarienne
author: abecedarienne

comments.content:
I haven't heard from anyone about this. If I missed your message, comment here.

Otherwise, I'll assume that these are worthless and throw them away...
